zone.line: Man, oh not men; a chain of linked thought
Of love & might to be divided not
Compelling the elements with adamantine
stress--
As the Sun rules, even with a tyrants
gaze
The unquiet Republic of the maze
Of Planets, struggling fierce towards Heavens
er
free wild ness.
Man, one harmonious Soul of many a soul
Whose nature is it's own divine controul
Where all things flow to all, as rivers to the sea;
Familiar acts are beautiful thro love
in
Labour & Pain & Grief through life's green
grove
Sport like tame beasts--none knew how
gentle they could be
His Will, with all mean passions, bad delight{s}
And selfish cares, its trembling satellites,
A spirit ill to guide, but mighty to obey{;}
Is as a tempest-winged ship, whose helm
Love rules, through waves which dare
not overwhelm
Forcing Life's wildest shores to own its sovereign{s}
sway
